Title: The Baby's Here! (4)
Plot: We've been waiting and the moment everyone's been looking forward to has finally come: Mrs. Pepper is ready to have her new baby. While she's at the hospital and we wait for Mr. Salt's phone call, we do things like look at baby albums to pass the time. Later, we visit the baby hospital with Blue, Steve and Paprika and meet the new baby. Finally, the baby comes home and we give it a special welcome home.
GuestStars: Veronica Shea, Annalivia Balaban, Lisa Kudrow, Erica Byrd, Christopher Coombs, Keith Jerome, Emily Mammone, Stacey Molina-Byrd, Danny Parks, Caleb Rubin
